name: schizophrenia
content:

a serious mental illness in which someone cannot understand what is real and what is imaginary: He was diagnosed with paranoid schizophrenia.
informal the state of having qualities or attitudes that are different from each other and do not work well together: Lexington, as a prison and a hospital, was an expression of America's schizophrenia about how to treat addiction.
